app_descript:
App Name: Hive Social

App Package Name: org.hiveinc.TheHive.android

Brief: Hive Social is a dynamic platform where meaningful interactions intertwine with a sense of community. It emphasizes chronological timelines to ensure you're always updated with the latest posts from family and friends. The app goes the extra mile with its 'Asks and Polls' feature, enhancing user engagement, and a curated feed that promotes content discovery.

  • ğŸ”„ Reposted Content Discovery: Easily find new mutuals by viewing reposted content in your home feed.
  • ğŸŒ Creator Friendly Algorithm: Enjoy a curated Discover page, tailored to introduce you to new communities and content creators.
  • âœ… Content Prioritization: Save your favorite communities and creators to have their content always appear first in your feed.
